ModMetaData.name: RePower Patch Pack
ModMetaData.author: Mlie

li.displayName: Turn It On and Off - RePowered

ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img]
Patches for various mods to use the RePower-system for a more realistic power consumption. If you are using a mod that is missing here, just leave a comment with a link to it and I'll add it to the pack if compatible!
This pack contains all my other RePower-patches.
Can be used with either the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1845531445]RePowerReborn-mod[/url] or my extended version [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2228219259]Turn It On and Off - RePowered[/url]
Supported mods: [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1386412863]Android Tiers[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1833163132]Ceramics[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1649368867]Electric Stonecutting Table[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=725956940]Expanded Prosthetics and Organ Engineering[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1949064302]Expanded Prosthetics and Organ Engineering Forked[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1558635181]GloomyFurniture[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1542048177]High Tech Laboratory Facilities (Continued)[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1414438179]Project RimFactory 3.0 - Public Beta[/url] [*][url=https://github.com/spdskatr/ProjectRimFactory/releases/latest]ProjectRimFactory - Core[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=850429707] Rah's Bionics and Surgery Expansion[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=850428056] Rah's Bionics and Surgery Expansion - Hardcore Edition[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1127530465]Rimatomics[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1321849735]Rimefeller[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1541536041][CP] Rimmu-Nation - [img]https://i.imgur.com/O0IIlYj.png[/img] Since modding is just a hobby for me I expect no donations to keep modding. If you still want to show your support you can gift me anything from my [url=https://store.steampowered.com/wishlist/id/Mlie]Wishlist[/url] or buy me a cup of tea.
[url=https://ko-fi.com/G2G55DDYD][img]https://i.imgur.com/Utx6OIH.png[/img][/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Log Uploader[/url] or the standalone [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Uploader[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
